    public class ProcessorIntrospectionInboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements ProcessorIntrospectionI
    The class ProcessorIntrospectionInboundPort defines an inbound port associated with the interface ProcessorIntrospectionI.
